author: Reuters Editorial
title: Aveva Group Updates On UK Tax Treatment Of Return Of Value
text:
May 3 (Reuters) - AVEVA Group PLC:
* UPDATE ON UK TAX TREATMENT OF RETURN OF VALUE * RECEIVED CONFIRMATION FROM HMRC THAT RETURN OF VALUE WILL NOT BE TREATED AS DISTRIBUTION AND THEREFORE WILL NOT BE TAXED AS INCOME IN HANDS OF RECIPIENTS FOR TAX PURPOSES
* DOES NOT INTEND TO HAVE FURTHER DISCUSSIONS WITH HMRC ON THIS MATTER Source text for Eikon: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
Our
